name: Funimation - Better Subtitle Font
description:
Make the subtitles more legible!

For questions / requests contact via Discord:
Kapila#1491

Amazon Video Subtitle style:
https://userstyles.org/styles/182307/amazon-video-better-subtitle-outline
additional_info:
Change log:

7/18/20

- Changed to the font "Assistant"
- Subtitle outline is thicker



04/27/2020

- No longer overrides background color, font color, or font size settings set by Funimation. These can now be changed though your account settings on funimation.com



03/07/2020

- Updated to have a solid border instead of the gradient shadows.
